short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peacekeeper will notify you for each website you specify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Determine whether the server environment you are accessing is local, development, test, staging, or production.

Use these for notification.
- alert
- change the favicon
- change the style
